entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Manicouagan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:17 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -22.6°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
